title: 3CE K-Beauty Makeup Brushes and Pouches Release | Hypebae
text:
Korean beauty label 3CE has revealed a brand-new collection of makeup accessories, featuring both brushes and chic pouches to store all your goodies in. The brand debuts an 11-piece brush set of high-quality makeup brushes for face, eyes and lips, all crafted from synthetic bristles from Germany. The ultra-soft material is easy to use, and won’t cause any harm or irritation to your skin when using. Of course, the brushes also come in 3CE’s signature pink hue. In addition to the makeup brushes, a new and sturdy pouch is also available. Arriving in various sizes, the pieces are crafted from a durable nylon material and features the 3CE logo embroidered across the front. The pieces are currently available at 3CE counters, as well as online at I.T e-shop. Take a look at the makeup brushes and pouches in the gallery above, and let us know if you’ll be copping.
